explanation: [0-0] A red bird and a blue elephant are playing on the beach. The red bird has piled up the sand into the shape of a bucket, and the blue elephant is playing with another pile of sand next to it. They both have their eyes closed and smiles on their faces. Colorful English words and a small monkey sticker appear above the picture, against a light blue background.

[0-9] They are playing with the sand, look up and open their eyes to look at each other, then turn their heads to the left. The picture moves to the left, and a little monkey appears, putting sand into a purple bucket. Then it puts down the shovel, turns to face the bird, and buckles the bucket upside down on the beach, making a sandcastle, laughing happily.
